text:
http://www.ginetta.net | Frontend: Modular CSS (BEM etc.) / ES6, Vue.js | Zurich | Salary: 95k-105k CHF | EU passport only

In these two roles (1. modular CSS, 2. Javascript), we look for engineers who are responsible for building large frontend-heavy applications for our UX-clients. You will work with a team of designers, UX-researchers and developers to help our clients define and meet their project goals.

Hiring process:

- Resume / code-check

- Phone call (getting to know each other)

- Onsite day (half a day)

Send a mail with your Github or / and resume to:

jobs@ginetta.tech
